casebody.data:
Jared GUIDRY and Leigha Woods
v.
STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY and Ronald Chambers No. 2019-C-0223 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 20, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE FIFTH CIRCUIT COURT OF APPEAL, PARISH OF JEFFERSON Writ denied. GUIDRY, J., recused.

HUGHES, J., would grant.

GENOVESE, J., would grant for the reasons assigned by Judge Marc Johnson.
